attributes.description:
If you are looking for a trusted, reliable, multiple award-winning dealer to purchase your preowned vehicle from, then look no further. We offer certified used vehicles that you can trust and rely on at affordable prices with the best service. Let us structure a deal for you today. We offer in-house finance and pay top prices on all trade-ins. Nationwide delivery available upon request. No pre-fitted accessories are included in the price.
Pricing does not include on the road and service and delivery fees and is subject to in-house finance.

attributes.description:
The Dzire gives you comfort and design flowing seamlessly through classic sedan styling. Touches of silver in its black interior tie the look together, giving you affordable luxury that gets attention. The spacious cabin frees up your movement while the ergonomically-placed controls allow you to enjoy every drive.
The Suzuki Dzire comes standard with a 2 year / 30 000 km Service Plan and a 5 year / 200 000 km Promotional Warranty. For the best Suzuki experience, your Suzuki Dzire must be serviced once every twelve months or every 15 000 km, whichever comes first.

attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0872502162. Warranty valid until March 2023 or 100 000 km's, whichever comes first. 
Service plan valid until March 2023 or 100 000 km's, whichever comes first. 
Purchase this 2020 Fiat 500 900T Twinair Sport Cabriolet now! It is sporty and nippy with a classic compact design that is still relevant to this day. You can get around town quickly and efficiently with this sporty hatchback. It provides the right amount of power for this compact hatchback. It produces 77 kW of power and 145 Nm of torque. It provides excellent fuel consumption as the manufacturers' claimed fuel consumption figures averages at 4.2 litres per 100 km. This is exceptional! You get the perfect balance of sportiness and elegance and it still offers fuel savviness.    


ALL PRE-OWNED VEHICLES UNDERGO A STRINGENT AA MULTI-POINT CHECK AND AA ROADWORTHY BEFORE DELIVERY. WE DELIVER COUNTRYWIDE AND IT GETS EVEN BETTER, WE COME TO YOU. FINANCE AVAILABLE AND A TEST DRIVE IS A MUST. PRICE EXCLUDES LICENSE REGISTRATION, ADMINISTRATION, DELIVERY, AND ON THE ROAD FEES.

*ERRORS AND OMISSIONS EXCEPTED

attributes.description:
Mahindra's basic vehicles are highly reliable.
The Mahindra Pik-up S6 was tested in 2016 and received a five-star ANCAP safety rating. ... Nonetheless, it managed just 15 out of 16 for the frontal offset crash test, with ANCAP noting that the Pik-up's passenger compartment “held its shape reasonably well,footwell and firewall intrusion”
4 YEAR 120 000 KM WARRANTY
5 YEAR 90 000 KM SERVICE PLAN
